row.text: Episcopo Consentino interdicit, ne diaconum quendam „sine licentia summi pontificis ad superiorem gradum ascendere permittat“. App. conc. Lat. XXVI. 12, Coll. Lips. XI. 13, Coll. Cass. XXI. 17, Coll. Bamb. XI. 12, Comp. I. L. 5. t. 10. c. 9, Decr. Greg. L. V. t. 12. c. 8. — „Continebatur in litteris“.
